text:
─Wonderful, isn't it?
Just as ordered, down to the smallest details.

Yeah, I wanted to incorporate the motifs
everyone came up with as much as possible.

Especially the gear motifs.
I think they add a nice accent.

That's right─...
The brilliance catches the eye, and above all─

These gears,
they seem to symbolize us, don't they?

Ah... Gears, when combined,
can generate even greater power.

Could it be likened to our five gathering
together and striving diligently?

I see, that's the meaning behind it.
Haha, a wonderful expression, fitting of Sakuya.

Hehe, thank you.
We just need to keep turning this gear─
